description: On-Chain Privacy for Web 3, DeFi and more

primary_languages.usage: Core blockchain implementation, cryptographic primitives, runtime logic
EVM smart contracts for Manta Pacific L2

blockchain_frameworks.name: Substrate
blockchain_frameworks.usage: Layer 1 blockchain framework for Manta Atlantic

blockchain_frameworks.name: OP Stack
blockchain_frameworks.usage: Layer 2 rollup framework for Manta Pacific

consensus_networks.name: Polkadot
consensus_networks.role: Parachain host network for Manta Atlantic L1

consensus_networks.name: Ethereum
consensus_networks.role: Host network for Manta Pacific L2

cryptographic_libraries.name: arkworks
cryptographic_libraries.usage: R1CS constraint system, Groth16 zk-SNARK implementation

cryptographic_libraries.name: OpenZL
cryptographic_libraries.description: Zero-Knowledge Cryptography Infrastructure Stack curated by Manta

data_availability.name: Celestia
data_availability.usage: Data availability layer for Manta Pacific L2

additional_infrastructure.name: Eclair DSL
additional_infrastructure.description: Embedded Circuit Language And Intermediate Representation - DSL in Rust for circuit logic
additional_infrastructure.usage: Type-safe circuit construction and proof-system-agnostic descriptions

privacy_techniques.primary_technique: zk-SNARKs (Zero-Knowledge Succinct Non-Interactive Arguments of Knowledge)

specific_protocols.name: Groth16
specific_protocols.usage: Production R1CS proof system via arkworks/groth16
characteristics: Requires trusted setup with toxic waste
Leverages bilinear pairing properties of elliptic curves
Efficient verification of complex algebraic relations
Small proof size and fast verification

specific_protocols.name: PLONK
specific_protocols.usage: Alternative proof system with universal trusted setup

cryptographic_primitives.name: Poseidon Hash
cryptographic_primitives.usage: Merkle tree construction and circuit-efficient hashing

cryptographic_primitives.name: Commitment Schemes
cryptographic_primitives.usage: Hiding transaction details while maintaining verifiability

privacy_protocols.name: MantaPay
privacy_protocols.description: Privacy-preserving payment protocol based on zk-SNARKs
features: Private sending of wrapped assets (BTC, ETH, DOT)
Redemption of anonymous tokens for underlying assets

privacy_features.description: Only sender and receiver witness transaction details
Privacy at base layer prevents MEV and front-running

zkp_system_components.description: Private information known only to prover

zkp_properties: Completeness - Valid statements can always be proven
Soundness - Invalid statements cannot be falsely proven
Zero-Knowledge - No additional information leaked beyond statement validity
